title: Item
description: An Item from the games, like “Poké Ball” or “Bicycle”.

category.title: Category
category.description: Identifier for the ItemCategory this item belongs to.

pocket.title: Pocket
pocket.description: Identifier for the ItemPocket this item appears in.

buy.title: Item purchase price
buy.description: Omit if this item cannot be purchased.

sell.title: Item sell price
sell.description: Usually half the purchase price.  Omit if this item cannot be sold.

flags.title: Flags
flags.description: Special attributes that affect how the game treats this item.

fling_effect.title: Fling effect
fling_effect.description: The identifier of the effect the move *Fling* has when used by a Pokemon holding this item.

fling_power.title: Fling power
fling_power.description: The power of the move *Fling* has when used by a Pokemon holding this item.

machine.title: TM/HM data
machine.description: Omit if this item is not a machine.

move.title: Move taught
move.description: The identifier for the move taught

berry.title: Berry data
berry.description: Omit if this item is not a berry

natural_gift_type.title: Natural Gift move type
natural_gift_type.description: The type the move *Natural Gift* has when used by a Pokemon holding this item.

natural_gift_power.title: Natural Gift move power
natural_gift_power.description: The power the move *Natural Gift* has when used by a Pokemon holding this item.

growth_time.title: Growth time (hours)
growth_time.description: The length of one growth stage.  Berries go through several of these growth stages before they can be picked.

water.title: Water usage
water.description: The speed at which this Berry dries out the soil as it grows. A higher rate means the soil dries more quickly.

smoothness.title: Smoothness
smoothness.description: The smoothness of this Berry, used in making Pokéblocks or Poffins.

harvest.title: The number of berries that can grow on one tree
